p: The modified method described by Yang et al. (2014) was used for this assay [ 37]. In this test, 0.3 mL solution of extract or standard (ascorbic acid) was mixed with 3 mL of reagent mixture (4 mM ammonium molybdate, 0.6 M sulfuric acid and 28 mM trisodium phosphate). This reaction mixture was incubated at 90 °C for 90 min followed by cooling to room temperature. The absorbance of the reaction mixture was measured at 695 nm. The IC 50 values were calculated by comparison with the absorbance of blank preparation.
